title: This Scum Is Not Worthy Of White Washing - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Cold Love Interests   Cultivation   Dense Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Omegaverse   Power Couple   Seme Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 流光闪腰
description:
The straight-as-steel man Xie Chenyang was selected by the system. In the original plot, these men were embarrassed by the scum gong and their families were destroyed, but forget everything after the scum stepped down and coaxed them. Do you really want to reconcile with the scum?

Xie Chenyang: “Why did you choose me?”

System: “Well…Because you are determined and straightforward, you will definitely not forgive the scumbags!”

The system watched Xie Chenyang kick away the scumbags, marry a gangster, and bring his wife back to abuse the scum, with a dazed expression:

Is this still the 10,000-year-old straight as steel man?>
